Features.title: Key Features
Features.subtitle: Everything you need for a super fast WordPress website
Features.f1_desc: Install, activate, and done. No confusing server configuration or complicated API keys.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.s1_content: SmallPict respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our WordPress image optimization service.
Privacy.s2_content: We collect the following types of information:
Privacy.s2_item1: Account Information: Email address and website URL when you activate the plugin.
Privacy.s2_item2: Usage Data: Number of images processed, file sizes, and optimization statistics.
Privacy.s2_item3: Technical Data: WordPress version, PHP version, and plugin version for compatibility.
Privacy.s3_content: We do NOT store your images. When you upload an image through our service:
Privacy.s3_item1: Your image is temporarily processed in our secure cloud infrastructure.
Privacy.s3_item2: The optimized image is immediately sent back to your WordPress site.
Privacy.s3_item3: Both the original and optimized versions are deleted from our servers within minutes.
Privacy.s3_item4: We do not keep any copies of your images.
Privacy.s4_content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS), secure cloud infrastructure, and regular security audits to protect your data.
Privacy.s5_content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at privacy@tuxnoob.com for any data-related requests.
Privacy.s6_content: For any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@tuxnoob.com

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.s1_content: By using SmallPict, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
Terms.s2_content: SmallPict is a cloud-based image optimization service for WordPress. We provide automatic compression and format conversion (WebP, AVIF) to help improve your website performance.
Terms.s3_content: Each subscription plan includes a monthly image processing quota:
Terms.s3_item1: Free tier: Limited monthly quota for personal/testing use.
Terms.s3_item2: Paid tiers: Higher quotas based on your subscription level.
Terms.s3_item3: Usage beyond quota will be queued until the next billing cycle.
Terms.s4_content: Payments are processed securely through Freemius. Subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled. All sales are final. We do not offer refunds.
Terms.s5_content: We strive for 99.9% uptime but do not guarantee uninterrupted service. Scheduled maintenance will be announced in advance when possible.
Terms.s6_content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us at: support@tuxnoob.com
